title: These money and investing tips can help you see this bear market more clearly
text:
* Curb your enthusiasm — the bear market is alive and well

* Don't bet on political outcomes — stock market investors don't really care who controls the Senate

Sign up here to get MarketWatch's best mutual funds and ETF stories emailed to you weekly!
